content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Description can be understood correctly with a 4-second glance (but "capital O" requires thought "zero can't be capital") and the task was fun to solve, personally want to see more challenges like this

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Overall a fun challenge that's easy to understand but at the same time different enough that I had to pause and think of an approach. Tests covers all the different scenarios well. Well done!

✅ Approved the contribution.

Good complexity for a clash, seems complex on first glance but is very doable.  My only complaint is that the Exemplary test is one of the more difficult ones, so I'd prefer that would be placed as sixth instead of first.  Other than that, very good contribution.  As far as I see everything is clear and correctly formatted.
